"A.P.242/3/11": "Tama-hime, is it safe for you to be here?"

"With Harkotan in the state that it's in, won't it cause trouble for Kotoshiro if you're not
around...?"
"You forget, Matoi. Tama-hime is my double. My true body is still on Harkotan."
"Ah, that's right. Are you feeling well? And what about Kotoshiro...?"
"Worry not. Injured we may be, but Kotoshiro and I are well."
"The realm of the living is still rife with Photoner weapons, rampaging about..."
"The lives of the survivors are principal. All who dwell in the Kakuriyo are safe for the time."
"They are safe at present. 'Tis only a matter of time before Shiva finds a way in."
"However, the weapons rampaging about are mere underlings. Concern is unnecessary."
"Shiva's focus is now aimed at you."
"Should her gaze turn back toward Haroktan, we will be extinguished."
"Therefore, it is only logical that we would support you."
"Worry not for Harkotan, focus solely on what you must do."
